comments:
Build ID: I20070209-1006

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Open an Ecore diagram.
2. Right-click empty space and choose File -> Save as Image file.
3. Choose any location and file format SVG.
A message stating that the file export cannot be completed pops up.- The error log contains the stack trace shown below. Export to PNG works. The problem first occurred with an existing installation of 3.3M4, but I just reproduced it with a fresh install of 3.3M5. 


More information:

Is there anything I can do to help squashing this bug? I need this diagram export rather urgently for my bachelor's thesis, so I'd be willing to try out whatever might fix it...
Since GMF 2.0 M6 was released April 5, 2007, doing a bulk move of all open Bugzillas currently on M6 to 2.0 M7. Owners will need to access if the issue really is targetted for 2.0 M7.
This works for me in GMF2 M7 again
Verified working again in GMF I20070601.
